title: Capture The Flag
description: Participants need to find flags hidden in software. The team with the most points after collecting all flags wins!

title: Exoplanet Hunt
description: Astronautics is not just about gazing at the stars! This event is an SQL based competition to identify habitable exoplanets from a plethora of ones!

title: Escape Room
description: Multiple levels which will have problem statements that the participant would be expected to solve in order to progress through the game.

title: Bug Bounty
description: Inspect open source code, catch all the bugs as fast as possible!

title: Fool's programming
description: Like a short programming contest, but with a twist! The hardest part of the problem is not programming the solution but deciphering the question.

title: Tech Quiz
description: A General quiz with special rounds for tech specific questions.

title: The Chess Bot Challenge
club: The Chess Club x The Gaming Club
description: A contest designed for game developers and chess enthusiasts to showcase their programming skills and strategic thinking

title: Theory Group: Workshop
description: Dive into a Theoretical CS problem, exploring not only the history and famous approaches, but also implement them!
